title: Designing an Implicit Curriculum for the Acquisition of Portuguese Gender Grammar

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate Portuguese conversational skills and basic grasp of grammar
context.additional_context: Designed for office/administrative professionals, centered on smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can classify Portuguese noun genders (masculine/feminine) with over 85% accuracy
Learners can transform adjectives, articles, and pronouns according to gender agreement rules with over 75% accuracy
Learners can independently diagnose and correct gender errors in real-life contexts by applying strategies at least three times

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
